query:
SELECT
            c.ticker,
            c.name as company_name,
            ic.weight,
            c.market_cap,
            c.space_score,
            c.segments
        FROM index_compositions ic
        JOIN companies c ON ic.company_id = c.id
        WHERE ic.index_name = $1
        AND ic.rebalance_date = (
            SELECT MAX(rebalance_date)
            FROM index_compositions
            WHERE index_name = $1
        )
        ORDER BY ic.weight DESC
